teamList.name: Joe Mordica
teamList.bio: Joe is a Christ follower, husband, and father (in that order). Joe founded VOXO and enjoys creating and innovating in the software industry. He created VOXO to fix the broken industry of telecom and help people think differently about how they do business.

teamList.name: Phil Watson
teamList.bio: Phil is a visionary with a passion for using his platform to help people find purpose in their work. He loves to challenge the status quo and is an outside-the-box thinker. Phil is a follower of Jesus and enjoys spending time with his wife and three children. His hobbies include - Pigeon Racing, hunting, and ping-pong.

teamList.name: Chancellor Montgomery
teamList.bio: Chancellor Montgomery serves as our CPO. In this role, Chancellor is a critical player in strengthening the relationships within the organization and VOXO customers. Chancellor has a passion for music, fashion, and helping others walk in their God-given gifts. Chancellor enjoys spending time with his wife Shonice, building his brand Third World, and enjoying the great outdoors.

teamList.name: Nick Kelsoe
teamList.bio: Nick has been a long-time strategic partner of VOXO, starting the first remote VOXO location in Mobile, AL. Nick is a Christ follower and family man who loves building relationships and growing VOXO. He has a passion for discipleship and has been involved in youth ministry.

teamList.name: Tim Watson
teamList.bio: Tim is the VP of Operations, ensuring a smooth onboarding process once a customer chooses VOXO. Tim and his wife Lucy have three sons, and he spends his spare time archery hunting, grilling, and dabbling in music.

teamList.name: Ervin Bauman
teamList.bio: Ervin enjoys hard work and challenges. He loves building personal relationships with his clients. Outside of work, Ervin is a pastor and enjoys doing life with his family.

teamList.name: Josh Reed
teamList.bio: Josh is an analytical thinker and skilled business strategist. Josh joined the VOXO cause with a passion for using business as a means to positively impact the lives of others. Josh is a principled leader and is passionate about remaining true to the VOXO values. Josh enjoys family, flying, and golf.

teamList.name: Joel Myrick
teamList.bio: Since 2017, Joel has worked to make sure VOXO's customers satisfaction comes first. Joel is married to the #1 who has given him 3 wonderful children. His passion is coaching! He has been coaching little league baseball for over 5 years.

teamList.name: James Harrod
teamList.bio: James joined VOXO in 2019 bringing experience in software development. A problem solver at heart, he aims to leverage technology to solve complex problems on the mission of fixing telecom. He is married and has two children. In his free time, James enjoys time with family, video games, and continued education and R&D.

teamList.name: Noah Post
teamList.bio: Noah has a passion for helping people solve telecom problems with a focus on fixing the telecom industry. When not in front of a computer, you can find Noah on the tennis court, in the great outdoors, or enjoying fellowship with friends.

teamList.name: Anthony Felipe
teamList.bio: Anthony is a Christ-loving husband and father of three. He's the best benchwarmer that church league basketball has ever seen. He is a military veteran and a tremendous asset to the VOXO team with humility being his most valuable asset.

teamList.name: Daniel Charpie
teamList.bio: Daniel has a knack for problem solving and enjoys helping VOXO customers experience a level of service that is unmatched. Daniel is married, from Alabama, a military veteran, and enjoys video games.

teamList.name: Seth Bigony
teamList.bio: Seth joined VOXO as the sales director during the summer of 2021 and is dedicated to helping grow lasting relationships with VOXO customers. He graduated magna cum laude from West Texas A&M and has a common passion for technology with his son, Blake. Seth is married and has 5 children.

teamList.name: Stephen Dindinger
teamList.bio: Stephen manages the VOXO PA operations and enjoys relationship building. Stephen is married and has 3 kids. He enjoys the outdoors in his spare time.

teamList.name: Nate Hochstetler
teamList.bio: Nate shares a common mission of making a difference in his daily encounters with people. As a man of faith, he has found the meaning of life. Nate values holding on to things that are not bought, and giving away things he can't keep. He is a husband and father of 4.
